languages.text: "О нем, д-да. О пастыре культистов смерти, что убийствами почитают Императора. Ткачи его еретиков истребляют, а бывает — и праведников жизни лишают. Неисповедимы пути их служения истового и кровавого".

traits.locale_text: "О нем, д-да. О пастыре культистов смерти, что убийствами почитают Императора. Ткачи его еретиков изничтожают, а бывает и вовсе праведников жизни лишают. Неисповедимы пути их служения истового да кровавого".
traits.speaker: TrueGvedon

languages.text: "Y-yes, that's him. He leads the death cultists, the lot who worship the Emperor by killing. His spinners hunt down heretics, but sometimes they take righteous lives too. Their service is mysterious, fervent, and bloody."
languages.original_text: "О нем, д-да. О пастыре культистов смерти, что убийствами почитают Императора. Ткачи его еретиков истребляют, а бывает — и праведников жизни лишают. Неисповедимы пути их служения истового и кровавого".

traits.locale_text: "Y-yes, that's him. He leads the death cultists, the lot who worships the Emperor by killing. His spinners hunt down heretics, but sometimes they take righteous lives too. Their service is mysterious, fervent, and bloody."
traits.speaker: TrueGvedon

traits.locale_text: "Y-yes, that's him. He leads the death cultists, the lot who worships the Emperor by killing. His spinners hunt down heretics, but sometimes they take righteous lives too. Their service is mysterious, fervent, and bloody."
traits.speaker: TrueGvedon

traits.locale_text: "Y-yes, that's him. He leads the death cultists, the lot who worship the Emperor by killing. His spinners hunt down heretics, but sometimes they take righteous lives too. Their service is mysterious, fervent, and bloody."
traits.speaker: TrueGvedon

traits.locale_text: "Who else, Mistress? A holy man, he is. He teaches ignorant folk like me how to serve the Undying Emperor in the right way. And his weavers grant death to the sick, the crippled, and the weary."
traits.speaker: TrueGvedon

traits.locale_text: "Y-yes, that's him. He leads the death cultists, the lot who worship the Emperor by killing. His spinners hunt down heretics, but sometimes they take righteous lives too. Their service is mysterious, fervent, and bloody."
traits.speaker: TrueGvedon

traits.locale_text: "Y-yes, that's him. He leads the death cultists, the lot who worship the Emperor by killing. His spinners hunt down heretics, but sometimes they take righteous lives too. Their service is mysterious, fervent, and bloody."
traits.speaker: TrueGvedon

traits.locale_text: "Y-yes, that's him. He leads the death cultists, the lot who worship the Emperor by killing. His spinners hunt down heretics, but sometimes they take righteous lives too. Their service is mysterious, fervent, and bloody."
traits.speaker: TrueGvedon

languages.text: « Ou-oui, c'est bien lui. Le guide spirituel des cultistes de la mort, qui rendent hommage à l'Empereur en exerçant leurs talents de tueurs. Ses tisseurs pourchassent les hérétiques, mais parfois, il leur arrive aussi d'éliminer des âmes pieuses. Leurs saints offices sont ancrés dans le sang, le mystère et la ferveur. »
languages.original_text: "Y-yes, that's him. He leads the death cultists, the lot who worship the Emperor by killing. His spinners hunt down heretics, but sometimes they take righteous lives too. Their service is mysterious, fervent, and bloody."

traits.locale_text: « Ou-oui, c'est bien lui. Le guide spirituel des cultistes de la mort, qui rendent hommage à l'Empereur en exerçant leurs talents de tueurs. Ses tisseurs pourchassent les hérétiques, mais parfois, il leur arrive aussi d'éliminer des âmes pieuses. Leurs saints offices sont ancrés dans le sang, le mystère et la ferveur. »
traits.speaker: TrueGvedon

traits.locale_text: « De qui d'autre voudriez-vous que je parle, maîtresse ? C'est un homme saint entre tous. Il apprend aux ignorants tels que moi comment bien servir l'Empereur immortel et ses tisseurs accordent une mort miséricordieuse aux malades, aux estropiés et à tous ceux qui sont las de vivre. »
traits.speaker: TrueGvedon

languages.text: «S-sí, ese es. Lidera a los cultistas de la Muerte, los que adoran al Emperador a base de matar. Sus tejedoras dan caza a los herejes, aunque a veces también se llevan por delante vidas inocentes. Sirven de manera misteriosa, ferviente y sangrienta».
languages.original_text: "Y-yes, that's him. He leads the death cultists, the lot who worship the Emperor by killing. His spinners hunt down heretics, but sometimes they take righteous lives too. Their service is mysterious, fervent, and bloody."

traits.locale_text: «S-sí, ese es. Lidera a los cultistas de la Muerte, los que adoran al Emperador a base de matar. Sus tejedoras dan caza a los herejes, aunque a veces también se llevan por delante vidas inocentes. Sirven de manera misteriosa, ferviente y sangrienta».
traits.speaker: TrueGvedon

traits.locale_text: «¿A quién si no, maestra? Es un hombre santo. Enseña a los ignorantes como yo a servir al Emperador Inmortal de la forma correcta. Y sus tejedores otorgan la muerte a los enfermos, los tullidos y los exhaustos».
traits.speaker: TrueGvedon

languages.text: “没……没错，就是他。他是那群教徒的首领，那些人通过杀人来祭拜帝皇。他手下的织网者会消灭异端分子，但有时候也会杀害好人。他们的行事风格非常神秘、狂热、血腥。”
languages.original_text: "Y-yes, that's him. He leads the death cultists, the lot who worship the Emperor by killing. His spinners hunt down heretics, but sometimes they take righteous lives too. Their service is mysterious, fervent, and bloody."

traits.locale_text: “没……没错，就是他。他是那群教徒的首领，那些人通过杀人来祭拜帝皇。他手下的织网者会消灭异端分子，但有时候也会杀害好人。他们的行事风格非常神秘、狂热、血腥。”
traits.speaker: TrueGvedon

traits.locale_text: “除此之外，还能是谁呢，女士？他是位圣洁的人，他教化像我这样的无知之人，教会我如何以正确的方式侍奉不死帝皇。而他的织网者，则会将死亡的解脱带给那些病重之人、残疾之人、筋疲力尽之人。”
traits.speaker: TrueGvedon

languages.text: 「は…はい、そいつです。殺すことで皇帝を崇拝する、死のカルトのリーダーです。織り手たちは異端者を狩り出しますが、時には正しく生きている者の命も奪います。彼らの奉仕活動は謎めいていて、熱狂的で、血なまぐさいものです」
languages.original_text: "Y-yes, that's him. He leads the death cultists, the lot who worship the Emperor by killing. His spinners hunt down heretics, but sometimes they take righteous lives too. Their service is mysterious, fervent, and bloody."

traits.locale_text: 「は…はい、そいつです。殺すことで皇帝を崇拝する、死のカルトのリーダーです。織り手たちは異端者を狩り出しますが、時には正しく生きている者の命も奪います。彼らの奉仕活動は謎めいていて、熱狂的で、血なまぐさいものです」
traits.speaker: TrueGvedon

traits.locale_text: 「他に誰がいるんですか？彼は聖なる男だ。 彼は私のような無知な民に、正しい方法で不滅の皇帝に仕える方法を教えてくれました。そして彼の織り手は、病人、不具者、疲れ果てた者に死を与えます」
traits.speaker: TrueGvedon

languages.text: "J-ja, das ist er. Er führt die Todeskultisten an, die den Imperator mit Morden ehren. Seine Spinner bringen Ketzer zur Strecke, nehmen mitunter aber auch rechtschaffene Leben. Ihr Dienst ist geheimnisvoll, fanatisch und blutig."
languages.original_text: "Y-yes, that's him. He leads the death cultists, the lot who worship the Emperor by killing. His spinners hunt down heretics, but sometimes they take righteous lives too. Their service is mysterious, fervent, and bloody."

traits.locale_text: "J-ja, das ist er. Er führt die Todeskultisten an, die den Imperator mit Morden ehren. Seine Spinner bringen Ketzer zur Strecke, nehmen mitunter aber auch rechtschaffene Leben. Ihr Dienst ist geheimnisvoll, fanatisch und blutig."
traits.speaker: TrueGvedon

traits.locale_text: "Von wem sonst, Herrin? Er ist ein heiliger Mann. Er lehrt Unwissende wie mich, wie man dem Todlosen Imperator richtig dient. Und seine Weber schenken den Kranken, den Verkrüppelten und den Erschöpften den Tod."
traits.speaker: TrueGvedon
